column5: Sad news indeed. I thought the Gov. was making inroads in gaining his release.They demanded 6 million plus for his release. Not to be. RIP Robert Hall  http://www.aljazeera.com/news/2016/06/abu-sayyaf-groups-beheads-canadian-hostage-160613090026588.html
Sad news.  Im really sick of hearing this type of stuff  RIP
Just brutal...  What else can you say.
very sad but what can you do? Paying the ransom would only lead to more kidnappings
